Description: Painted sycomore fig(?) wood shabti of Aamert with a blue lappet-wig, a red face with black features, a blue and yellow collar, red hands holding two black hoes, the legs are inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs on a yellow ground flanked by red lines, the rest of the body is painted white(mainly missing from the back) and the backs of the arms are decorated with two representations of red seed-bags.
